content:
# It seems that I am still too far away from the position where I attempted to place the stone furnace.
# I need to move closer to the exact coordinates of the stone patch where I want to place the furnace.

# I will directly move to the coordinates of the nearest stone patch to ensure I am within range to place the furnace.
desired_stone_position = nearest_stone_position  # Position of the nearest stone patch.
move_to(desired_stone_position)  # Move to the exact position of the stone patch.
